original_text: Then Solomon assembled the elders of Israel and all the heads of the tribes, the leaders of the fathers' houses of the people of Israel, before King Solomon in Jerusalem, to bring up the ark of the covenant of the Lord out of the city of David, which is Zion.
korean_text: 이에 솔로몬이 여호와의 언약궤를 다윗 성 곧 시온에서 메어 올리고자 하여 이스라엘 장로와 모든 지파의 우두머리 곧 이스라엘 자손의 족장들을 예루살렘에 있는 자기에게로 소집하니

sentences.original_text: Then Solomon assembled the elders of Israel
and all the heads of the tribes
the leaders of the fathers' houses of the people of Israel
to bring up the ark of the covenant of the Lord
out of the city of David
